org.qualitune.jouleunit
Class SimpleEnergyProfile

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.jouleunit.AbstractEnergyProfile
      org.qualitune.jouleunit.SimpleEnergyProfile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, EnergyProfile
public class SimpleEnergyProfile
extends AbstractEnergyProfile

An SimpleEnergyProfile contains the result of profiling issued by an JouleProfiler.

Author:
Claas Wilke
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

SimpleEnergyProfile

public SimpleEnergyProfile()
Creates a new SimpleEnergyProfile with no duration and energy consumption. Use addPowerRateValue(PowerRate) to modify these values.

public double getConsumedEnergy(java.lang.String firstID,
                                java.lang.String secondID)
Description copied from interface: EnergyProfile
Returns the consumed energy in mJ between logged events identified by two given IDs.

Parameters:
firstID - The first ID of the events whose interval duration shall be returned.
secondID - The second ID of the events whose interval duration shall be returned.
Returns:
The consumed energy in mJ.

getDuration

public long getDuration(java.lang.String firstID,
                        java.lang.String secondID)
Description copied from interface: EnergyProfile
Returns the duration of this EnergyProfilein nano (10 ^ -9) seconds between logged events identified by two given IDs.

Parameters:
firstID - The first ID of the events whose interval duration shall be returned.
secondID - The second ID of the events whose interval duration shall be returned.
Returns:
The duration of this EnergyProfile in nano (10 ^ -9) seconds between the given logged events.

getPeakPowerRate

public long getPeakPowerRate(java.lang.String firstID,
                             java.lang.String secondID)
Description copied from interface: EnergyProfile
Returns the peak value of all PowerRates within two given events logged for this SimpleEnergyProfile in mW. Please note that the peak highly depends on the refresh rate within the JouleProfiler used for the SimpleEnergyProfile 's creation!

Parameters:
firstID - The first ID of the events whose interval duration shall be returned.
secondID - The second ID of the events whose interval duration shall be returned.
Returns:
The peak power rate of this SimpleEnergyProfile in the given interval in mW. Please note that this might be a negative value as negative values indicate discharging.

getSignificantValues

public java.util.List<PowerRate> getSignificantValues(java.lang.String firstID,
                                                      java.lang.String secondID)
Returns all PowerRate values of this SimpleEnergyProfile between to given events.

Parameters:

secondID - The second ID of the events whose PowerRate values shall be returned.
Returns:
All PowerRate values of this SimpleEnergyProfile between to given events.

logEvent

public void logEvent(java.lang.String identifier,
                     PowerRate powerRate)
Description copied from interface: EnergyProfile
Logs a given event for this EnergyProfile. An event consists of an identifier and a PowerRate value that includes the event's time stamp. Events can be used to separate the EnergyProfile into multiple parts, for which individual energy consumptions can be computed. E.g., this can be used to log the begin or end of the specific method's invocation during testing.

Parameters:
identifier - The identifier of the event (Must be unique within this EnergyProfile!).
powerRate - The associated PowerRate value (including the event's time stamp.

addPowerRateValue

public boolean addPowerRateValue(PowerRate value)
Adds a given PowerRate to this SimpleEnergyProfile.

Parameters:
value - The PowerRate to be added.
Returns:
true if adding was successful.
